data.name: First Assault - Section 9 Starter Crate
data.detailed_description:
Crate Contents


About the Game

Augment your experience and begin playing First Assault fully prepared with the new Section 9 Starter Crate. This package contains in-game currency, a 15 day Section 9 Pass, chipsets and the 44 Magnum to help start your experience off strong.

Starter Supply Crate Contains:
  • 200,000 GP
  • Section 9 Pass (15 Day)
  • 44 Magnum
  • 200 min Rapid Reload Chipset (x3)
  • 200 min Agile Step Chipset (x3)
  • 200 min Agile Strafe Chipset (x3)
  • 200 min Rapid Recharge Chipset (x3)
  • 200 min Quick Skill Chipset - Tier 2 (x3)

Limit 1 Section 9 Starter Crate Per Account. Crates Are Not Transferable.
This Crate is Only Available in Supported Regions

fullgame.name: Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex - First Assault Online

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Polish, Portuguese-Brazil, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 or higher compatible sound card or on board processor
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit or later
  • Processor: Intel i5 2500 3.3 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 or higher compatible sound card or on board processor
